document.discussion_title: Syngenta surge sees Swiss stocks outperform Europe
document.topic_text: LONDON, Aug 22 (Reuters) - Swiss shares outperformed a flat European stock market on Monday, boosted by a jump in Swiss chemical company Syngenta after a bid by ChemChina to buy the firm was »
document.post: LONDON, Aug 22 (Reuters) - Swiss shares outperformed a flat European stock market on Monday, boosted by a jump in Swiss chemical company Syngenta after a bid by ChemChina to buy the firm was »
